if your using testscape… open up client.java then search for admins…

you should see a list of people u get when you log onto ur server.
edit them to your name then you will be an admin and spawn away

item.title: Pickup command doesnt work.. :( could anyone help
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); }
Thats what im using…
Remember this gives right 2 only rights to do it, change to 0 if you want everyone can

item.title: Pickup command doesnt work.. :( could anyone help
item.dc:creator: @bloempot99 bloempot99
item.description:
@bloempot99 wrote:

pickup command doesnt work… could anyone help

i don’t know why it doesnt do it… but could anyone give the corred code for it…?

my code is now …

==============================================================================

			if (command.startsWith("pickup")) {
	try {
		int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
		int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
		if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
				addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
					} else {
						sendMessage("No such item."); }
							} catch(Exception e) {
								sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); } }

plz any help is welcome…

rep for the first person with the good code!!!
